org.springframework.web.client

类 RestClientException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • org.springframework.core.NestedRuntimeException
            • org.springframework.web.client.RestClientException
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    直接已知子类:
    ResourceAccessException, RestClientResponseException

    public class RestClientException
extends NestedRuntimeException
    Base class for exceptions thrown by RestTemplate whenever it encounters client-side HTTP errors.
    从以下版本开始:
    3.0
    作者:
    Arjen Poutsma
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      构造器和说明

      Construct a new instance of RestClientException with the given message.
      RestClientException(java.lang.String msg, java.lang.Throwable ex)
      Construct a new instance of RestClientException with the given message and exception.
